data: `minecraft:behavior.harvest_farm_block` allows the entity to search within an area for farmland with air above it. If found, the entity will replace the air block by planting a seed item from its inventory on the farmland block. This goal requires `minecraft:inventory` and `minecraft:navigation` to execute. This goal will not execute if the entity does not have an item in its inventory.

data.Name: goal_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks within the entity considers it has reached it's target position.

data.Name: max_seconds_before_search
data.Description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the goal can take before searching for the first harvest block. The time is chosen between 0 and this number.

data.Name: search_cooldown_max_seconds
data.Description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the goal can take before searching again, after failing to find a a harvest block already. The time is chosen between 0 and this number.

data.Name: search_count
data.Description: The number of randomly selected blocks each tick that the entity will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

data.Name: search_height
data.Description: The Height in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

data.Name: search_range
data.Description: The distance in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

data.Name: seconds_until_new_task
data.Description: The amount of time in seconds that the goal will cooldown after a successful reap/sow, before it can start again.

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the entity when using this Goal.
